grid.itemplacer

Class ChargedIdentityDiscPlacer

  • java.lang.Object
    • grid.itemplacer.ItemPlacer
      • grid.itemplacer.ChargedIdentityDiscPlacer

  • public class ChargedIdentityDiscPlacer
extends ItemPlacer
    Places the chargedIdentityDisc on the specified grid. The chargedIdentityDisc is placed at an equal distance (+- 2 squares) from each player

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChargedIdentityDiscPlacer(Grid grid, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
      Constructs a new ChargedIdentityDiscPlacer, it should place the ChargedIdentityDisc at an equal distance of each player ( + - MAX_DIFFERENCE)

    • Method Summary

      Places the item.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChargedIdentityDiscPlacer

        public ChargedIdentityDiscPlacer(Grid grid,
                         java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
        Constructs a new ChargedIdentityDiscPlacer, it should place the ChargedIdentityDisc at an equal distance of each player ( + - MAX_DIFFERENCE)
        Parameters:
        grid - the grid on which the chargedIdentityDisc is placed
        players - the players which the placement should respect.
